dict.acceptation: 污染（作用）；腐败；堕落；沾污；

sent.orig: There are many kinds of pollution, like sound pollution, air pollution and water pollution.
sent.trans: 有许多种污染，像声音污染、空气污染和水污染。

sent.orig: With the effective control of source pollution, non-source pollution becomes the main factor of water pollution.
sent.trans: 随着点源污染的有效管理和控制，非点源污染已成为水环境污染的主要原因。

sent.orig: Today, there is air pollution, water pollution and land pollution.
sent.trans: 今天，有空气污染，水质污染和土地污染。

sent.orig: Agricultural non point sources pollution is a popular one of non point sources pollution types.
sent.trans: 农业非点源污染是一种分布广泛的非点源污染类型。

sent.orig: Statistics on other types of pollution other than industrial pollution are difficult to collect.
sent.trans: 工业污染以外的其它污染资料收集困难。
